channel.title: Music GCSE paper had answers on the back
channel.description:
As you know I and a few others are taking our GCSE exams (United Kingdom etc etc). One exam board was stupid enough to accidentally leave some answers on the back of the exam sheet. Full story here: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/education/7414129.stm
Thousands of teenagers are facing uncertainty over their exams after a GCSE music paper was found to have some of the answers on the back.
Luckily I was with the AQA board and not the OCR. [b]Here is what it was like:[/b]
[img]http://newsimg.bbc.co.uk/media/images/44680000/jpg/_44680632_question3_466.jpg[/img] [img]http://newsimg.bbc.co.uk/media/images/44680000/jpg/_44680633_question4_466.jpg[/img] [img]http://newsimg.bbc.co.uk/media/images/44680000/jpg/_44680631_answers3_4_466.jpg[/img]
[b]Anyone had this paper? If so did you see the answers on the back?[/b] P.S. Sorry this post isn't laid out very well.

item.title: Music GCSE paper had answers on the back

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

As you know I and a few others are taking our GCSE exams (United Kingdom etc etc). One exam board was stupid enough to accidentally leave some answers on the back of the exam sheet. Full story here:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/education/7414129.stm

Thousands of teenagers are facing uncertainty over their exams after a GCSE music paper was found to have some of the answers on the back.

Luckily I was with the AQA board and not the OCR.

Here is what it was like:

[img]http://newsimg.bbc.co.uk/media/images/44680000/jpg/_44680632_question3_466.jpg[/img] [img]http://newsimg.bbc.co.uk/media/images/44680000/jpg/_44680633_question4_466.jpg[/img] [img]http://newsimg.bbc.co.uk/media/images/44680000/jpg/_44680631_answers3_4_466.jpg[/img]

Anyone had this paper? If so did you see the answers on the back?

P.S. Sorry this post isn’t laid out very well.
